objects.name: Tank
objects.description: Primary combat vehicle controlled by the player.

objects.name: Outpost
objects.description: Strategic point on the map that can be captured.
objects.source_note: [Tank War] Outpost Design - Base Capture Mode

systems.name: In-game GUI System
systems.description: System governing the graphical user interface during gameplay.
systems.mechanics: Displays HP, stats, shop, minimap, and other interactive elements.
systems.objectives: Provide players with essential information and interaction options.

systems.name: Combat System
systems.description: System governing combat mechanics in Tank War.
systems.mechanics: Handles damage dealt, health management, and skill usage.
systems.objectives: Facilitate balanced and engaging combat interactions.
interactions: Damage dealt updates HP of objects.
Skills can override or cancel each other.
systems.source_note: [Combat Module][Tank War] Mobile Skill Control System

logic_rules.description: Health bars are color-coded based on player perspective.
logic_rules.trigger: Player views an object's health bar.
logic_rules.effect: Health bar changes color to blue (ally), green (outpost/team DEF), or red (enemy).

logic_rules.description: Shoot joystick transforms into a skill joystick for aiming skills.
logic_rules.trigger: Player selects a skill requiring aiming.
logic_rules.effect: Joystick behavior changes to allow skill aiming and activation.
logic_rules.source_note: [Combat Module][Tank War] Mobile Skill Control System

requirements.title: GUI Component Implementation
requirements.description: Ensure all GUI components are implemented as per design specifications.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: All components listed in the GUI design document are functional and meet usability standards.

requirements.title: Combat Balancing
requirements.description: Balance combat mechanics to ensure fair and engaging gameplay.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Damage, HP, and skill usage are balanced across all objects and systems.
requirements.source_note: [Combat Module][Tank War] Mobile Skill Control System
